name: Sierra Nevada Pale Ale
description: Sierra Nevada Pale Ale is a delightful example of the classic pale ale style. It showcases the Cascade hop, known for its floral aroma and citrusy flavor.

name: Guinness Draught
description: Guinness Draught is a classic Irish dry stout, known for its creamy texture and rich, roasted flavor. It features notes of coffee, chocolate, and a hint of caramel.

name: Heineken
description: Heineken is a globally recognized lager, known for its crisp and refreshing taste. It has a balanced flavor with subtle hop notes.

name: Stella Artois
description: Stella Artois is a Belgian pilsner with a smooth and slightly bitter taste. It is known for its distinctive golden color and floral aroma.

name: Blue Moon Belgian White
description: Blue Moon Belgian White is a popular wheat beer brewed with Valencia orange peel and a touch of coriander. It has a citrusy and refreshing flavor.

name: Samuel Adams Boston Lager
description: Samuel Adams Boston Lager is a full-bodied and flavorful beer with a balance of malt sweetness and hop bitterness. It has a rich amber color.

name: Budweiser
description: Budweiser is an American-style lager known for its crisp and clean taste. It is brewed with high-quality ingredients for a refreshing experience.

name: Corona Extra
description: Corona Extra is a light and refreshing Mexican lager with a smooth and crisp taste. It is often served with a wedge of lime for added flavor.

name: IPA
description: IPA (India Pale Ale) is a hop-forward beer style known for its strong and bitter flavor. It features floral, citrus, and piney hop aromas.

name: Wheat Beer
description: Wheat beer is a refreshing beer style brewed with a significant proportion of wheat. It has a light and crisp character with notes of banana and clove.

name: Pilsner
description: Pilsner is a pale lager beer with a clean and crisp taste. It originated in the Czech Republic and is characterized by its golden color and hop bitterness.

name: Porter
description: Porter is a dark beer style with a rich and malty flavor. It often features notes of chocolate, coffee, and caramel, with a smooth and velvety texture.

name: Stout
description: Stout is a dark and robust beer style with a roasted malt flavor.

name: Hefeweizen
description: Hefeweizen is a German wheat beer known for its cloudy appearance and flavors of banana and clove. It has a refreshing and slightly tart taste.

name: Belgian Tripel
description: Belgian Tripel is a strong and complex beer style with fruity esters, spicy phenols, and a moderate hop bitterness. It has a golden color and a dry finish.

name: Amber Ale
description: Amber Ale is a balanced beer style with a malt-forward profile and moderate hop bitterness. It has a reddish-amber color and flavors of caramel and toasted bread.

name: Saison
description: Saison is a farmhouse-style ale with a fruity and spicy character. It is known for its dry and refreshing nature, with a touch of tartness.

name: Dunkelweizen
description: Dunkelweizen is a dark wheat beer with flavors of chocolate, caramel, and toasted malt. It has a rich and smooth character, complemented by the banana and clove notes of a traditional Hefeweizen.

name: Belgian Witbier
description: Belgian Witbier, also known as White Beer, is a refreshing wheat beer brewed with coriander and orange peel. It has a hazy appearance and a citrusy flavor with hints of spice.

name: American Pale Ale
description: American Pale Ale is a hop-forward beer style with a strong malt backbone. It features citrusy and piney hop flavors, balanced with caramel and biscuit notes from the malt.

name: Gose
description: Gose is a traditional German sour beer style brewed with coriander and salt. It has a tart and slightly salty taste, with hints of citrus and spice.

name: Milk Stout
description: Milk Stout, also known as Sweet Stout, is a dark beer style with a creamy and smooth texture. It features flavors of roasted malt, chocolate, and a touch of sweetness.

name: ESB (Extra Special Bitter)
description: ESB is a British beer style with a balance of malt sweetness and hop bitterness. It has a copper color and flavors of toffee, caramel, and earthy hops.

name: Rauchbier
description: Rauchbier is a German beer style known for its smoky flavor, reminiscent of smoked meats. It has a dark color and a rich malt character, with a subtle hop presence.

name: Belgian Dubbel
description: Belgian Dubbel is a Trappist beer style with a rich and complex flavor profile. It features notes of dark fruits, caramel, and spices, with a moderate level of sweetness.

name: Weihenstephaner Hefeweissbier
description: Weihenstephaner Hefeweissbier is a renowned German Hefeweizen with a long-standing brewing tradition. It exhibits a cloudy appearance, a refreshing banana and clove flavor profile, and a smooth, creamy texture.

name: Chimay Blue
description: Chimay Blue, also known as Chimay Grande Réserve, is a Belgian Trappist ale with a robust and complex character. It showcases a deep mahogany color, rich malty flavors, fruity esters, and a warming alcohol presence.

name: Sapporo
description: Sapporo is a popular Japanese lager with a crisp and clean taste. It is brewed using quality ingredients, resulting in a light and refreshing beer that pairs well with a variety of cuisines.

name: Tiger Beer
description: Tiger Beer is a well-known Asian lager brewed in Singapore. It features a smooth and crisp profile with a touch of hop bitterness and a clean finish, making it a popular choice for many beer enthusiasts.

name: Dos Equis Ambar
description: Dos Equis Ambar is a Mexican Vienna Lager with a rich amber color and a balanced blend of malt sweetness and hop bitterness. It offers flavors of toasted bread, caramel, and a hint of floral notes.

name: Peroni Nastro Azzurro
description: Peroni Nastro Azzurro is an Italian lager that exudes a crisp and refreshing character. It is crafted using a meticulous brewing process, resulting in a beer with a delicate balance of malt and hop flavors.

name: Tsingtao
description: Tsingtao is a popular Chinese lager with a light and clean profile. It is brewed using high-quality ingredients and showcases a mild malt sweetness, subtle hop notes, and a smooth finish.

name: Asahi Super Dry
description: Asahi Super Dry is a Japanese rice lager known for its light and crisp taste. It offers a clean and refreshing flavor profile with subtle fruity and floral notes.

name: Hoegaarden
description: Hoegaarden is a classic Belgian witbier with a hazy appearance and a refreshing citrus and spice flavor. It is brewed with coriander and orange peel, resulting in a distinctive and flavorful beer.

name: Fuller's ESB
description: Fuller's ESB (Extra Special Bitter) is a British ale with a deep amber color and a rich, malty character. It features a well-balanced combination of hop bitterness and malt sweetness, creating a satisfying and flavorful brew.

name: Paulaner Hefe-Weissbier
description: Paulaner Hefe-Weissbier is a classic German Hefeweizen with a rich history and a distinctive character. It features a cloudy appearance, a fruity and spicy flavor profile, and a smooth, creamy texture.

name: Rochefort 10
description: Rochefort 10 is a renowned Belgian Quadrupel brewed by Trappist monks. It is a complex and full-bodied beer with flavors of dark fruits, caramel, and warming alcohol. It has a deep mahogany color and a rich, velvety texture.

name: Erdinger Weissbier
description: Erdinger Weissbier is a well-known German Hefeweizen that exemplifies the style's characteristics. It offers a refreshing blend of banana, clove, and yeast flavors, with a smooth and effervescent mouthfeel.

name: Pilsner Urquell
description: Pilsner Urquell is a legendary Czech Pilsner that pioneered the Pilsner beer style. It has a crisp and clean taste, with a balanced malt sweetness and a pronounced hop bitterness. It features a golden color and a refreshing finish.

name: Modelo Especial
description: Modelo Especial is a popular Mexican lager known for its smooth and refreshing character. It offers a balanced flavor profile with notes of malt, corn, and a touch of hop bitterness.

name: Franziskaner Weissbier
description: Franziskaner Weissbier is a traditional German Hefeweizen that captures the essence of the style. It boasts a cloudy appearance, a fruity and spicy flavor profile, and a lively carbonation that enhances its overall refreshment.

name: Cerveza Negra
description: Cerveza Negra is a flavorful dark lager hailing from Latin America. It features a deep brown color, roasted malt flavors, hints of chocolate and caramel, and a smooth, clean finish.

name: Kronenbourg 1664 Blanc
description: Kronenbourg 1664 Blanc is a refreshing white beer from France. It is brewed with wheat, featuring a hazy appearance, citrusy notes, and a subtle spicy undertone.

name: Brooklyn Lager
description: Brooklyn Lager is an American amber lager with a robust malt profile and a firm hop bitterness. It showcases flavors of caramel, toasty bread, and floral hop notes, offering a well-balanced and flavorful experience.

name: Leffe Blonde
description: Leffe Blonde is a Belgian Blonde Ale with a bright golden color and a complex flavor profile. It offers a balance of fruity esters and spicy phenols.

name: Samuel Adams Boston Lager
description: Samuel Adams Boston Lager is a classic American Vienna Lager with a rich amber color and a balanced blend of malt sweetness and hop bitterness. It features flavors of caramel, toasted bread, and a hint of citrus.

name: Guinness Draught
description: Guinness Draught is an iconic Irish dry stout with a velvety texture and a rich, roasted flavor. It showcases notes of coffee, chocolate, and a subtle bitterness, offering a distinctively smooth and satisfying drinking experience.

name: Duvel
description: Duvel is a renowned Belgian Strong Golden Ale with a strong and complex character. It features a pale golden color, fruity esters, spicy phenols, and a dry finish. It is known for its effervescent carbonation and warming alcohol presence.

name: Augustiner Helles
description: Augustiner Helles is a traditional Munich Helles Lager with a pale golden color and a clean, crisp taste. It offers a balanced combination of bready malt flavors, subtle hop bitterness, and a refreshing finish.

name: Chimay Red
description: Chimay Red, also known as Chimay Première, is a Trappist Belgian Dubbel with a deep brown color and a rich, malty character. It showcases flavors of dark fruits, caramel, and a touch of spice, with a medium body and a smooth finish.

name: Pilsner Urquell
description: Pilsner Urquell is a renowned Czech Pilsner that pioneered the Pilsner beer style. It has a crisp and clean taste, with a balanced malt sweetness and a pronounced hop bitterness. It features a golden color and a refreshing finish.

name: Rogue Dead Guy Ale
description: Rogue Dead Guy Ale is a Maibock-style beer with a deep amber color and a rich, malty flavor. It offers a balanced combination of toffee, caramel, and toasted malt notes, with a subtle hop presence and a smooth, clean finish.

name: La Chouffe
description: La Chouffe is a Belgian Strong Ale with a golden color and a lively carbonation. It features fruity and spicy flavors, with hints of citrus, coriander, and a touch of sweetness, creating a refreshing and enjoyable drinking experience.

name: Weihenstephaner Kristallweissbier
description: Weihenstephaner Kristallweissbier is a crystal-clear version of a German wheat beer. It offers a refreshing and light-bodied profile with flavors of banana, clove, and a crisp, wheaty character.

name: Tripel Karmeliet
description: Tripel Karmeliet is a renowned Belgian Tripel with a golden color and a complex flavor profile.
